TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PackageDigitalSignature extends System.Object

summary.span: Represents a digital signature that is applied to a set of package parts and relationships.

span.span: Represents a digital signature that is applied to a set of package parts and relationships.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个对象是不可变的在创建后无法更改。A object is immutable and cannot be altered after it is created. 为了安全性，可以与中的部件相关联。For security, a can be associated with parts within a . 一个包含 X.509 证书，它提供两个功能：A incorporates an X.509 certificate that provides two features: - 标识部件的发信方并对其进行身份验证。Identifies and authenticates the originator of the part. - 验证部件是否尚未被修改。Validates that the part has not been modified. 数字签名不会阻止从正在修改的一部分，但如果以任何方式更改该部件已针对签名验证检查会失败。The digital signature does not preclude a part from being modified, but a validation check against the signature fails if the part has changed in any way. 应用程序然后可以采取相应的措施-例如，它可以阻止打开部件或部分已被修改，且不安全，它可以通知用户。The application can then take appropriate action—for example, it can prevent the part from opening or it can notify the user that the part has been modified and is not secure. 有关数据包数字签名的详细信息，请参阅 MSDN 文章[开放打包约定的数字签名框架](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494)。For more information about package digital signatures, see the MSDN article [Digital Signing Framework of the Open Packaging Conventions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=74494).

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CertificateEmbeddingOption As CertificateEmbeddingOption

summary.span: Gets the X.509 certificate embedding option.

span.span: Gets the X.509 certificate embedding option.

value.span: 其中一个值，该值指定用于数字签名的选项。

span.span: One of the values that specifies the option for the digital signature.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 用来验证包的 X.509 证书可能存储在三个位置之一：X.509 certificates used to validate a package may be stored in one of three locations: ||| |-|-| ||在其自己的证书包中。In its own certificate in the package.

可以通过获取 X.509 证书属性。The X.509 certificate can be obtained through the property.| ||中的内容包中。Within the content of the in the package.

可以通过获取 X.509 证书属性。The X.509 certificate can be obtained through the property.| ||已知创建签名的应用程序和更高版本用于验证签名的应用程序的位置中的包的外部。External to the package in a location known by both the application that creates the signature and the application that later uses the signature for validation.|

span.span: The digital has been deleted.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 提供对与执行特定于类型的签名加密函数和序列化的基础类访问托管签名。 provides access to the foundation class that performs type-specific signature cryptographic functions and serialization to and from the that hosts the signature.

summary.span: Gets the X.509 certificate of the signer.

value.span: 数字证书签名者，或如果证书未存储在。

span.span: The digital certificate of the signer, or if the certificate is not stored in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数字的证书存储的包中时返回的签名者的 X.509 证书 (即，当是或)。 returns the X.509 certificate of the signer when the digital certificate is stored within the package (that is, when is or ). 返回`null`时的包中不存储的 X.509 证书 (即，当是)。 returns `null` when the X.509 certificate is not stored in the package (that is, when is ).

span.span: The digital has been deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SigningTime As DateTime
public: property DateTime SigningTime { DateTime get(); };

summary.span: Gets the date and time that the signature was created.

span.span: Gets the date and time that the signature was created.

value.span: 日期和创建签名的时间。

span.span: The date and time that the signature was created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定的日期格式。The property specifies the format of the date. 格式字符串，基于属性创建签名时生效。The format of the string is based on the property in effect when the signature was created. 基于位置的签名发生在计算机的系统时间。 is based on the system time of the computer where the signing took place. 不是"安全时间戳"，并不是来自受信任的时间戳颁发机构。 is not a "secure TimeStamp" and is not from trusted Time Stamp Authority. 必须获取并通过受信任的时间戳颁发机构应用安全时间戳。A secure TimeStamp must be obtained and applied through a trusted Time Stamp Authority.

span.span: The digital has been deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property TimeFormat As String
public: property System::String ^ TimeFormat { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: Gets the format of the date and time returned by the property.

span.span: Gets the format of the date and time returned by the property.

value.span: 格式的日期和时间返回属性。

span.span: The format of the date and time returned by the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 日期/时间格式遵循 W3C 的语法[日期和时间格式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=84446)注意。Date/time formats follow the syntax of the W3C [Date and Time Formats](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=84446) note. 下表中所示的组件必须使用的语法和标点所示。The components shown in the following table must use the syntax and punctuation shown. |TimeFormatTimeFormat|描述Description|示例Example| |----------------|-----------------|-------------| |YYYYYYYY|年Year|20052005| |YYYY MMYYYY-MM|年份和月份Year and month|2005-072005-07| |YYYY-MM-DDYYYY-MM-DD|完成日期Complete date|2005-07-282005-07-28| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZDYYYY-MM-DDThh:mmTZD|完成日期加上小时和分钟数Complete date plus hours and minutes|2005-07-28T19:20-01:002005-07-28T19:20-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZDYYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssTZD|完成日期加上小时、 分钟和秒Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds|2005-07-28T19:20:45-01:002005-07-28T19:20:45-01:00| |YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZDYYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.sTZD|完成日期加上小时、 分钟和秒小数部分，Complete date plus hours, minutes, and seconds with a decimal fraction|2005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:002005-07-28T19:20:45.75-01:00| 其中：where: ||| |-|-| |YYYYYYYY|四位数年份 （例如 2006 年）four-digit year (for example 2006)| |MMMM|两位数月份 (01 = 年 1 月)two-digit month (01=January)| |DDDD|两位数日期的月份 (01 到 31 之间)two-digit day of month (01 through 31)| |ThhThh|两位数小时 (00 至 23、 24 时制时间)two-digit hour (00 through 23, 24-hour time)| |mmmm|两位数分钟 (00 到 59)two digits of minutes (00 through 59)| |ssss|两个位数的秒数 (从 00 到 59)two digits of seconds (00 through 59)| |秒s|一个或多个数字表示秒的小数one or more digits representing a decimal fraction of a second| |TZDTZD|时区指示符 (Z 或 + hh: mm 或-hh: mm)time zone designator (Z or +hh:mm or -hh:mm)|

span.span: The digital has been deleted.
